SEARCH
Package Server.Manager

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
Server.Manager.UserManager
public class UserManager extends Object
The UserManager class provides methods to manage user registration, modification, searching, and display of user information.

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public static void registerUser(String mail, String name, String first_name, String birth_date, String address, String phone_number, int number_borrow) throws SQLException
      Registers a new user with the provided information into the database.
      Parameters:
      mail - The email of the user
      name - The name of the user
      first_name - The first name of the user
      birth_date - The birth date of the user
      address - The address of the user
      phone_number - The phone number of the user
      number_borrow - The number of books currently borrowed by the user
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • modifyInformation

      public static void modifyInformation(String mail, String name, String first_name, String birth_date, String address, String phone_number) throws SQLException
      Modifies user information based on the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      mail - The email of the user
      name - The new name of the user
      first_name - The new first name of the user
      birth_date - The new birth date of the user
      address - The new address of the user
      phone_number - The new phone number of the user
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • searchUser

      public static User searchUser(String mail) throws SQLException
      Searches for a user based on the provided email.
      Parameters:
      mail - The email of the user to search for
      Returns:
      The User object corresponding to the provided email
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • displayUser

      public static List<Object> displayUser(String mail) throws SQLException
      Displays the user details along with their borrowing history.
      Parameters:
      mail - The email of the user to display
      Returns:
      A list containing the user details and their borrowing history
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • displayUserList

      public static List<User> displayUserList()
      Displays the list of all users in the database.
      Returns:
      A list containing all users in the database

    • displayUserBorrowLateList

      public static List<User> displayUserBorrowLateList()
      Displays the list of users who have overdue book borrowings.
      Returns:
      A list containing users with overdue borrowings

    • isUserEmailExists

      public static boolean isUserEmailExists(String mail)
      Checks if a user with the given email already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      mail - The email to check for existence
      Returns:
      True if the email exists, otherwise false
